report.title: List of locations for mapping
report.description: Basic list of locations designed for mapping.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false WHERE l.deleted=false AND (l.public=true or lw.website_id in (#website_ids#)) #filters#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: bounds
param.description: Well known text for the bounding box to load

param.name: parent_id
param.description: ID of the parent site to filter to

column.name: sc
column.sql: case l.id % 6 when 0 then '#ff0000' when 1 then '#00ff00' when 2 then '#0000ff' when 3 then '#770077' when 4 then '#777700' else '#330055' end
